<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Considering user experience hints**

I noticed that when using handleSelection, the shift key is essential for showing the selection popover while selecting text. This isn't clear for many users, so we should provide a UX hint: they need to press Shift to open the popover. Currently, if they hold shift during selection or press it afterward, they'll see the popover, but that's not commonly understood. I think we could add a small tooltip near the selection when the popover isn't visible, like “Tip: Hold Shift while selecting to open branch popover.”
**Investigating selection events**

I need to look into how selection events, like mouseup and keyup, trigger handleSelection. I think it’s called with the event itself. It’ll be important to find out where this function is tied to the chat area. My next step will be to search for the usage of handleSelection—maybe a simple grep command will do the trick! This should help me confirm how the selection behavior is structured in the system.</details></think>

Aha: your selection UI already *requires* Shift (`handleSelection` bails unless `event.shiftKey`, and there’s also a global `keydown` handler for `Shift`). I’m going to add a small, non-annoying floating tip that appears **only when text is selected but Shift isn’t held**, and then auto-stops showing once you’ve used Shift (or you dismiss it).

.replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = {\n    if (!selectionPopover.visible) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.text?.trim()) return;\n    if (selectionPopover.messageIndex == null) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.nodeId) return;\n    if (!selectionPopover.treeId) return;\n\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      }),\n    );\n    setTempHighlight({\n      nodeId,\n      messageIndex: msgIdx,\n      tempId,\n      treeId: selectionPopover.treeId,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n    selectionPopover.treeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n      if (!node?.hasUnread) return node;\n      return {\n        ...node,\n        hasUnread: false,\n        requestStatus: node.requestStatus === \"ready\" ? \"idle\" : node.requestStatus,\n      };\n    });\n  }, [activeTreeId, activeNodeId]);\n\n  const addNode = (treeId, parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const treeIdSnapshot = activeTreeId;\n    const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeIdSnapshot];\n    const isFirstRootTurn =\n      activeNodeId === \"root\" &amp;&amp; (nodeSnapshot?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    const fallbackTitle = summarizeTitle(trimmed) || \"New tree\";\n    if (isFirstRootTurn) {\n      updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n        if (tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp; !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)) return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n\n      if (isFirstRootTurn &amp;&amp; treeSnapshot) {\n        requestTreeTitle(trimmed, reply || \"\")\n          .then((title) =&gt; {\n            const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n            updateTree(treeIdSnapshot, (tree) =&gt; {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.nodeId === sourceNodeId &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.treeId === treeId) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              tempHighlight.tempId,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    } else if (selectionPopover.messageIndex != null) {\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, sourceNodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== selectionPopover.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeId];\n      const baseNodes = treeSnapshot?.nodesById || nodesById;\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...baseNodes,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"tree-badge pending\"&gt;Pending&lt;/span&gt;}\n            {!isPending &amp;&amp; isReady &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"tree-badge ready\"&gt;Ready&lt;/span&gt;}\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  const resizeInput = (element) =&gt; {\n    if (!element) return;\n    element.style.height = \"auto\";\n    element.style.height = &#96;${element.scrollHeight}px&#96;;\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; sidebar.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel);\n  }, []);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleWindowWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n      if (!sidebar) return;\n      if (!sidebar.contains(event.target)) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    window.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n      passive: false,\n      capture: true,\n    });\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n        capture: true,\n      });\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n    document.body.classList.add(\"is-resizing\");\n  };\n\n  const visibleTreeList = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    if (!isTreeListCollapsed) return treeList;\n    if (!activeTreeId) return [];\n    return treeList.filter((t) =&gt; t.id === activeTreeId);\n  }, [isTreeListCollapsed, treeList, activeTreeId]);\n\n  const treeCountLabel = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    const count = treeList.length;\n    if (!isTreeListCollapsed) return &#96;${count} ${count === 1 ? \"tree\" : \"trees\"}&#96;;\n    if (count &lt;= 1) return &#96;${count} ${count === 1 ? \"tree\" : \"trees\"}&#96;;\n    return &#96;1 / ${count} trees&#96;;\n  }, [treeList.length, isTreeListCollapsed]);\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside\n        className=\"sidebar\"\n        style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; }}\n        ref={sidebarRef}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"sidebar-title-row\"&gt;\n            &lt;div&gt;\n              &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n              &lt;p &gt;\n                {treeCountLabel}\n              &lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header-actions\"&gt;\n              &lt;button\n                type=\"button\"\n                className=\"tree-list-collapse-button\"\n                onClick={() =&gt; (\n                    &lt;path d=\"M4 7h16M4 12h16M4 17h16\" /&gt;\n                  ) : (\n                    &lt;&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M4 7h11M4 12h16M4 17h11\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M17 9l3 3-3 3\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/&gt;\n                  )}\n                &lt;/svg&gt;\n              &lt;/button&gt;\n              &lt;button\n                type=\"button\"\n                className=\"new-tree-button\"\n                onClick={createNewTree}\n              &gt;\n                New tree\n              &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"tree-list\"&gt;\n            {visibleTreeList.map((tree) =&gt; {\n              const nodeCount = Object.keys(tree.nodesById || {}).length;\n              const isActive = tree.id === activeTreeId;\n              return (\n                &lt;div\n                  key={tree.id}\n                  className={&#96;tree-switch-row ${isActive ? \"node\" : \"nodes\"}&#96;}\n                    aria-label={&#96;${nodeCount} ${nodeCount === 1 ? \"node\" : \"nodes\"}&#96;}\n                  &gt;\n                    {nodeCount}\n                  &lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              );\n            })}\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n\n          &lt;div className=\"view-toggle\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"graph\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"graph\")}\n              aria-label=\"Graph view\"\n              title=\"Graph view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"6\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"18\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"12\" cy=\"18\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M8 6h8M7.5 7.5l3.5 8M16.5 7.5l-3.5 8\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"list\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"list\")}\n              aria-label=\"List view\"\n              title=\"List view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        {treeView === \"graph\" ? path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, \".\";\n      }\n      return nodeTitle || (id === \"root\" ? \"Root\" : null);\n    })\n    .filter(Boolean)\n    .join(\" &gt; \");\n\n  const lines = [\n    \"Hidden context for the assistant (do .join(\"\\n\");\n      lines.push(&#96;- ${ancestor.title}:\\n${snippet}&#96;);\n    });\n  }\n\n  return lines.join(\"\\n\\n\").trim();\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  const updateTree = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; {\n        if (tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp; !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)) return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n          if (i !== selectionPopover.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeId];\n      const baseNodes = treeSnapshot?.nodesById || nodesById;\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...baseNodes,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(treeId, newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(treeId, newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  const resizeInput = (element) =&gt; {\n    if (!element) return;\n    element.style.height = \"auto\";\n    element.style.height = &#96;${element.scrollHeight}px&#96;;\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  const updateTree = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n      if (next === tree) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [treeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateTreeNodes = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const nextNodes = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree.nodesById) : updater;\n      if (nextNodes === tree.nodesById) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [treeId]: {\n          ...tree,\n          nodesById: nextNodes,\n          updatedAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      return {\n        ...prevNodes,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prevNodes;\n      return { ...prevNodes, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const setActiveNodeId = (nodeId) =&gt; {\n    updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: nodeId }));\n  };\n\n  const createNewTree = () =&gt; {\n    const nextIndex = treeList.length + 1;\n    const tree = createTree(&#96;Tree ${nextIndex}&#96;);\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; ({ ...prev, [tree.id]: tree }));\n    setActiveTreeId(tree.id);\n    setTreeView(\"graph\");\n  };\n\n  const closeTreeMenu = () =&gt; {\n    setTreeMenu({\n      visible: false,\n      treeId: null,\n      rect: null,\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const openTreeMenu = (treeId, event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const buttonRect = event.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const left = Math.min(buttonRect.left, window.innerWidth - 260);\n    setTreeMenu({\n      visible: true,\n      treeId,\n      rect: { top: buttonRect.bottom + 8, left },\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: treesById[treeId]?.title ?? \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const deleteTree = (treeId) =&gt; {\n    const tree = treesById[treeId];\n    if (!tree) return;\n    const ok = window.confirm(&#96;Delete \"${tree.title}\"? This cannot be undone.&#96;);\n    if (!ok) return;\n\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const next = { ...prev };\n      delete next[treeId];\n      const remainingIds = Object.keys(next);\n      if (!remainingIds.length) {\n        const fresh = createTree(\"New tree\");\n        next[fresh.id] = fresh;\n      }\n      return next;\n    });\n\n    closeTreeMenu();\n\n    if (activeTreeId === treeId) {\n      const remaining = treeList.filter((t) =&gt; t.id !== treeId);\n      if (remaining.length) {\n        setActiveTreeId(remaining[0].id);\n      } else {\n        // Will be set by the activeTreeId/treeList effect after state update.\n        setActiveTreeId(null);\n      }\n    }\n  };\n\n  const requestTreeTitle = async (userMessage, assistantMessage = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-5 word title for this conversation.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 300)}&#96;,\n      assistantMessage ? &#96;Assistant: ${truncateForContext(assistantMessage, 360)}&#96; : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (treeMenu.visible) closeTreeMenu();\n  });\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const onKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (event.key === \"Shift\") {\n        const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n        if (payload) {\n          setSelectionPopover({\n            visible: true,\n            text: payload.text,\n            rect: payload.rect,\n            draft: \"\",\n            placement: payload.placement,\n            messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n            nodeId: activeNodeId,\n            treeId: activeTreeId,\n          });\n        }\n        return;\n      }\n      if (event.key !== \"Escape\") return;\n      window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      if (tempHighlight) {\n        updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n          messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setTempHighlight(null);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setError(\"\");\n  }, [activeTreeId]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const treeIdSnapshot = activeTreeId;\n    const treeSnapshot = treesById[treeIdSnapshot];\n    const isFirstRootTurn =\n      activeNodeId === \"root\" &amp;&amp; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    const fallbackTitle = summarizeTitle(trimmed) || \"New tree\";\n    if (isFirstRootTurn) {\n      updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n        if (tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp; !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)) return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n  if (typeof title !== \"string\") return fallback;\n  const cleaned = title.replace(/\\s+/g, \" \").trim();\n  if (!cleaned) return fallback;\n  const words = cleaned.split(\" \").filter(Boolean);\n  if (!words.length) return fallback;\n  return words.slice(0, 4).join(\" \");\n};\n\nconst escapeRegex = (value) =&gt; {\n  if (!content || !selectedText || !tempId) return content;\n  const start = &#96;${TEMP_HL_START}${tempId}]]]&#96;;\n  const end = TEMP_HL_END;\n\n  const cleaned = stripAllTempHighlights(content);\n  const exactIndex = cleaned.indexOf(selectedText);\n  if (exactIndex !== -1) {\n    return (\n      cleaned.slice(0, exactIndex) +\n      start +\n      cleaned.slice(exactIndex, exactIndex + selectedText.length) +\n      end +\n      cleaned.slice(exactIndex + selectedText.length)\n    );\n  }\n\n  const pattern = escapeRegex(selectedText.trim()).replace(/\\s+/g, \"\\\\s+\");\n  try {\n    const re = new RegExp(pattern, \"m\");\n    const match = re.exec(cleaned);\n    if (!match || match.index == null) return cleaned;\n    const matchText = match[0];\n    return (\n      cleaned.slice(0, match.index) +\n      start +\n      cleaned.slice(match.index, match.index + matchText.length) +\n      end +\n      cleaned.slice(match.index + matchText.length)\n    );\n  } catch {\n    return cleaned;\n  }\n};\n\nconst removeTempHighlightById = (content, tempId) =&gt; {\n  if (!content) return content;\n  if (!tempId) return stripAllTempHighlights(content);\n  const start = &#96;${TEMP_HL_START}${tempId}]]]&#96;;\n  return content.replaceAll(start, \"\").replaceAll(TEMP_HL_END, \"\");\n};\n\nconst convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight = (\n  content,\n  tempId,\n  highlightId,\n  branchNodeId,\n) =&gt; {\n  if (!content || !tempId || !highlightId || !branchNodeId) return content;\n  const tempStart = &#96;${TEMP_HL_START}${tempId}]]]&#96;;\n  const branchStart = &#96;${BRANCH_HL_START}${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}]]]&#96;;\n  return content\n    .replaceAll(tempStart, branchStart)\n    .replaceAll(TEMP_HL_END, BRANCH_HL_END);\n};\n\nconst wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight = (\n  content,\n  selectedText,\n  highlightId,\n  branchNodeId,\n) =&gt; {\n  if (!content || !selectedText) return content;\n  const start = &#96;${BRANCH_HL_START}${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}]]]&#96;;\n  const end = BRANCH_HL_END;\n\n  const exactIndex = content.indexOf(selectedText);\n  if (exactIndex !== -1) {\n    return (\n      content.slice(0, exactIndex) +\n      start +\n      content.slice(exactIndex, exactIndex + selectedText.length) +\n      end +\n      content.slice(exactIndex + selectedText.length)\n    );\n  }\n\n  const pattern = escapeRegex(selectedText.trim()).replace(/\\s+/g, \"\\\\s+\");\n  try {\n    const re = new RegExp(pattern, \"m\");\n    const match = re.exec(content);\n    if (!match || match.index == null) return content;\n    const matchText = match[0];\n    return (\n      content.slice(0, match.index) +\n      start +\n      content.slice(match.index, match.index + matchText.length) +\n      end +\n      content.slice(match.index + matchText.length)\n    );\n  } catch {\n    return content;\n  }\n};\n\nconst remarkBranchHighlights = () =&gt; {\n  const transformNode = (node) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    if (Array.isArray(node.children)) {\n      const nextChildren = [];\n      node.children.forEach((child) =&gt; {\n        if (child?.type === \"text\" &amp;&amp; typeof child.value === \"string\") {\n          let value = child.value;\n          while (true) {\n            const branchIdx = value.indexOf(BRANCH_HL_START);\n            const tempIdx = value.indexOf(TEMP_HL_START);\n            const startIdx =\n              branchIdx === -1\n                ? tempIdx\n                : tempIdx === -1\n                  ? branchIdx\n                  : Math.min(branchIdx, tempIdx);\n            if (startIdx === -1) break;\n            const isBranch = startIdx === branchIdx;\n            const metaEndIdx = value.indexOf(\"]]]\", startIdx);\n            if (metaEndIdx === -1) break;\n            const meta = value.slice(\n              startIdx + (isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_END.length : TEMP_HL_END.length),\n            );\n\n            if (before) nextChildren.push({ type: \"text\", value: before });\n            if (isBranch) {\n              const [highlightId, branchNodeId] = meta.split(\":\");\n              if (!highlightId || !branchNodeId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;branch-highlight:${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            } else {\n              const tempId = meta;\n              if (!tempId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;temp-highlight:${tempId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            }\n\n            value = after;\n          }\n\n          if (value) {\n            nextChildren.push({ ...child, value });\n          }\n          return;\n        }\n\n        transformNode(child);\n        nextChildren.push(child);\n      });\n      node.children = nextChildren;\n      return;\n    }\n\n    Object.values(node).forEach((value) =&gt; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst remarkLatexDelimiters = () =&gt; {\n  const normalizeDelimiters = (value) =&gt;\n    value\n      .replace(/\\\\\\[/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\]/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = inCode || node.type === \"code\" || node.type === \"inlineCode\";\n    if (node.type === \"text\" &amp;&amp; typeof node.value === \"string\" &amp;&amp; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value, nextInCode);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst STORAGE_KEY = \"chat-trees:v1\";\nconst SHIFT_HINT_KEY = \"chat-trees:shift-hint-dismissed:v1\";\n\nconst createTree = (title) =&gt; {\n  const now = Date.now();\n  return {\n    id: crypto.randomUUID(),\n    title,\n    nodesById: { root: createRootNode() },\n    activeNodeId: \"root\",\n    createdAt: now,\n    updatedAt: now,\n  };\n};\n\nconst loadTreesFromStorage = () =&gt; {\n  if (typeof window === \"undefined\") return null;\n  try {\n    const raw = window.localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY);\n    if (!raw) return null;\n    const parsed = JSON.parse(raw);\n    if (parsed?.version !== 1) return null;\n    if (!parsed.treesById || typeof parsed.treesById !== \"object\") return null;\n    const treeIds = Object.keys(parsed.treesById);\n    if (!treeIds.length) return null;\n    const activeTreeId = parsed.activeTreeId &amp;&amp; {\n  // Matches preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n  const scale = Math.min(\n    containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, offsetX, offsetY };\n};\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  if (typeof text !== \"string\") return \"\";\n  const cleaned = text.replace(/\\s+/g, \" \").trim();\n  if (cleaned.length &lt;= maxChars) return cleaned;\n  return &#96;${cleaned.slice(0, Math.max(0, maxChars - 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  const breadcrumb = path\n    .map((id, index) =&gt; {\n      const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;\n      if (index === path.length - 1 &amp;&amp; : \"\",\n  ].filter(Boolean);\n\n  const excerpt = node?.branchContext?.excerpt;\n  if (excerpt) {\n    lines.push(&#96;Branch highlight excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${truncateForContext(excerpt, 1200)}\"\"\"&#96;);\n  }\n\n  const ancestorIds = path.slice(0, -1);\n  if (ancestorIds.length) {\n    lines.push(\"Ancestor snippets (most recent turns):\");\n    ancestorIds.forEach((id) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; {\n    if (typeof window === \"undefined\") return false;\n    try {\n      return window.localStorage.getItem(SHIFT_HINT_KEY) === \"1\";\n    } catch {\n      return false;\n    }\n  });\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n    placement: \"above\",\n    messageIndex: null,\n    nodeId: null,\n    treeId: null,\n  });\n  const [selectionHint, setSelectionHint] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    rect: null,\n    placement: \"above\",\n  });\n  const [treeMenu, setTreeMenu] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    treeId: null,\n    rect: null,\n    mode: \"menu\",\n    draft: \"\",\n  });\n  const [tempHighlight, setTempHighlight] = useState(null);\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const inputRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n  const selectionHintRef = useRef(null);\n  const treeMenuRef = useRef(null);\n  const graphContainerRef = useRef(null);\n  const sidebarRef = useRef(null);\n  const panStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startY: 0,\n    tx: 0,\n    ty: 0,\n  });\n  const resizeStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startWidth: 0,\n  });\n\n  const activeTree = treesById[activeTreeId];\n  const nodesById = activeTree?.nodesById || {};\n  const activeNodeId = activeTree?.activeNodeId || \"root\";\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const isEmptyThread = (activeNode?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n  const shouldShowContext = activeNodeId !== \"root\";\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; ({\n      a({ href, children, ...props }) {\n        if (typeof href === \"string\" &amp;&amp; href.startsWith(\"temp-highlight:\")) {\n          const parts = href.split(\":\");\n          const tempId = parts[1];\n          return (\n            &lt;span\n              {...props}\n              className=\"branch-highlight is-temp\"\n              data-temp-id={tempId}\n              aria-hidden=\"true\"\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onBlur={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                // Avoid creating a new selection while clicking the highlight\n                event.preventDefault();\n              }}\n              onClick={(event) =&gt; {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n                setActiveNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onKeyDown={(event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  const updateTree = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree) : { ...tree, ...updater };\n      if (next === tree) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [treeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateTreeNodes = (treeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const tree = prev[treeId];\n      if (!tree) return prev;\n      const nextNodes = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(tree.nodesById) : updater;\n      if (nextNodes === tree.nodesById) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [treeId]: {\n          ...tree,\n          nodesById: nextNodes,\n          updatedAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      return {\n        ...prevNodes,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (treeId, nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prevNodes) =&gt; {\n      const node = prevNodes[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prevNodes;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prevNodes;\n      return { ...prevNodes, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const setActiveNodeId = (nodeId) =&gt; {\n    updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: nodeId }));\n  };\n\n  const createNewTree = () =&gt; {\n    const nextIndex = treeList.length + 1;\n    const tree = createTree(&#96;Tree ${nextIndex}&#96;);\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; ({ ...prev, [tree.id]: tree }));\n    setActiveTreeId(tree.id);\n    setTreeView(\"graph\");\n  };\n\n  const closeTreeMenu = () =&gt; {\n    setTreeMenu({\n      visible: false,\n      treeId: null,\n      rect: null,\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const openTreeMenu = (treeId, event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const buttonRect = event.currentTarget.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const left = Math.min(buttonRect.left, window.innerWidth - 260);\n    setTreeMenu({\n      visible: true,\n      treeId,\n      rect: { top: buttonRect.bottom + 8, left },\n      mode: \"menu\",\n      draft: treesById[treeId]?.title ?? \"\",\n    });\n  };\n\n  const deleteTree = (treeId) =&gt; {\n    const tree = treesById[treeId];\n    if (!tree) return;\n    const ok = window.confirm(&#96;Delete \"${tree.title}\"? This cannot be undone.&#96;);\n    if (!ok) return;\n\n    setTreesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const next = { ...prev };\n      delete next[treeId];\n      const remainingIds = Object.keys(next);\n      if (!remainingIds.length) {\n        const fresh = createTree(\"New tree\");\n        next[fresh.id] = fresh;\n      }\n      return next;\n    });\n\n    closeTreeMenu();\n\n    if (activeTreeId === treeId) {\n      const remaining = treeList.filter((t) =&gt; t.id !== treeId);\n      if (remaining.length) {\n        setActiveTreeId(remaining[0].id);\n      } else {\n        // Will be set by the activeTreeId/treeList effect after state update.\n        setActiveTreeId(null);\n      }\n    }\n  };\n\n  const requestTreeTitle = async (userMessage, assistantMessage = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-5 word title for this conversation.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 300)}&#96;,\n      assistantMessage ? &#96;Assistant: ${truncateForContext(assistantMessage, 360)}&#96; : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n        messageIndex: null,\n        nodeId: null,\n        treeId: null,\n      });\n    }\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        }),\n      );\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    }\n  });\n\n  useClickOutside(treeMenuRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n        messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId),\n          };\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n    setTempHighlight(null);\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n      treeId: null,\n    });\n    setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setError(\"\");\n  }, [activeTreeId]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      }),\n    );\n    setTempHighlight({\n      nodeId,\n      messageIndex: msgIdx,\n      tempId,\n      treeId: selectionPopover.treeId,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n    selectionPopover.treeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!activeTreeId) return;\n    updateNode(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; (nodeSnapshot?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    const fallbackTitle = summarizeTitle(trimmed) || \"New tree\";\n    if (isFirstRootTurn) {\n      updateTree(activeTreeId, (tree) =&gt; {\n        if (tree.title !== \"New tree\" &amp;&amp; !/^Tree \\d+$/.test(tree.title)) return tree;\n        return { ...tree, title: fallbackTitle };\n      });\n    }\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? {\n              if (!tree) return tree;\n              // Don't override if the user renamed it in the meantime.\n              if (tree.title !== fallbackTitle) return tree;\n              return { ...tree, title: nextTitle };\n            });\n          })\n          .catch(() =&gt; { });\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96;
